content: I'm trying to figure out how to update a host behind a firewall to use custom crate registry. My thought was to update something in ~/.cargo/config.toml to remap crates.io to my own registry. Is that possible? Or would i have to update every project to be aware of this custom registry?

https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/source-replacement.html
This may be what you need.
